268 POKE (1024+19+40*24),67
269 T1$ = "CURSOR"
270 FOR T=0 TO LEN(T1$)-1
271 POKE (1024+21+40*1)+T,ASC(MID$(T1$,T+1,1)) AND 63
272 NEXT T
273 T2$ = "GRANDMA"
274 FOR T=0 TO LEN(T2$)-1
275 POKE (1024+21+40*4)+T,ASC(MID$(T2$,T+1,1)) AND 63
276 NEXT T
277 T3$ = "FACTORY"
278 FOR T=0 TO LEN(T3$)-1
279 POKE (1024+21+40*7)+T,ASC(MID$(T3$,T+1,1)) AND 63
280 NEXT T
281 T4$ = "MINE"
282 FOR T=0 TO LEN(T4$)-1
283 POKE (1024+21+40*10)+T,ASC(MID$(T4$,T+1,1)) AND 63
284 NEXT T
285 T5$ = "SHIPMENT"
286 FOR T=0 TO LEN(T5$)-1
287 POKE (1024+21+40*13)+T,ASC(MID$(T5$,T+1,1)) AND 63
288 NEXT T
289 T6$ = "ALCHEMY LAB"
290 FOR T=0 TO LEN(T6$)-1
291 POKE (1024+21+40*16)+T,ASC(MID$(T6$,T+1,1)) AND 63
292 NEXT T
293 T7$ = "PORTAL"
294 FOR T=0 TO LEN(T7$)-1
295 POKE (1024+21+40*19)+T,ASC(MID$(T7$,T+1,1)) AND 63
296 NEXT T
297 T8$ = "TIME MACHINE"
298 FOR T=0 TO LEN(T8$)-1
299 POKE (1024+21+40*22)+T,ASC(MID$(T8$,T+1,1)) AND 63
300 NEXT T
